1.description: click the "theme-switch" button, the background color change from white to dark purple

2.description: after clicking the "login" button, turn to login page

3.description: after clicking the "Create a post" button, a new window pop out. there is options to choose the visibility of the post, and a text box to input post content, and a file upload button to upload image and video.

4.description: after clicking the "More" button, a new component pop out, which contains a "Bookmark Post" button.

5.description: after clicking the "Comment" button, a new component pop out, where we can see others' comments and a text box to write a comment.

6.description: after clicking the "Message" button, a new component pop out, where we can send message to the current user.
